_sText:
********************
****ctf_castle_wars****
********************
Map made by: Westsid3r & >>Nemesi$[FR]<<

*NEW IN V3*
- Guns can't be spammed.
- Guns protection added, hurt with 25hp when left clicking (same with the knife, dont use it).
- When a flag is saved by his own team, it respawn only if the gun has been removed from the world.
- The player who have the gun is forced to drop it by hurting. (when the flag is saved).
- 1 minutes after the rounds start, the crown can open his own gate.
- Only 1 king per team, if the king die, the crown is destroyed.
- The crowns heal only the players of his own teams.
- The flags are now detected immediatly : dont need to drop it to win.
- Underground added.
- Added more trees, rocks and high grass.
- Fish added in water.
- Water changed.
- Added 12 more spawnpoints.
- Barels respawn 20 seconds after using.
- Barels not kill.
- Lighning changed.
- Cubemap added (= some walls have a reflect).
- Skybox highest.
- Applause can be heared when a team won by taking the flag.
- Flag spawn like a trophy and light spot flashes when a team won with the flag.

Additional settings :

- mp_limitteams 1 (to balance the game)
- mp_freezetime 0 (no need freezetime, no buyzone)

******************
*****Map info:*****
******************

Player spawns: 72 (36 ct, 36 t)
Cannons: 4 (2 on each castle)
The ctf flags are on top of each castle
Players spawn with knife only.

*The flags are attached to a gun (USP)
-Pick it up to take the flag
-Bring it to the second floor in your base and drop it
-If you die, you will drop the gun/flag on the floor. If a person from your team
takes it up, he wields it. If a enemy player takes the flag, the flag will be teleported back to the base.
-If the flag is dropped into water, it will also teleport back to the base.
-There is a gun protection.

*Cannons
-Cannons can shoot after each 5seconds
-There is an instruction manual for the cannons on the wall nearby

*Crowns
-Pick the smokegrenade up above the gate and become the king of your castle
-If you die, crown will be destroyed.
-If you fire the smoke nade, the crown will disappear

*Teamwork
-Is required for more fun
-Knifing the huge doors alone can be hard and boring, easier with more
-Focus on helping the flag holder!

******************

Thanks to:
Zalos for the ctf prefab, which got tweaked by myself.
Smurfii, for his bridge prefab.
Runescape, for the idea.
i3D members and other people that helped testing this map.
